item.title: CVE-2024-34428|2024-05-09T11:15:21.036Z -- Harknell -- AWSOM News Announcement
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Harknell AWSOM News Announcement allows Stored XSS.This issue affects AWSOM News Announcement: from n/a through 1.6.0.
